snippet: As the Senate prepares to vote on a series of gun measures Wednesday afternoon, recent polls show a slim majority of Americans place a higher priority on enacting new gun laws to reduce gun violence over protecting the right to own guns.
abstract: As the Senate prepares to vote on a series of gun measures Wednesday afternoon, recent polls show a slim majority of Americans place a higher priority on enacting new gun laws to reduce gun violence over protecting the right to own guns.

headline.main: Public Opinion Stands Behind Democrats on Gun Measures
